actions.issue: Referenced file does not exist
actions.impact: Breaks recommended onboarding workflow for new users
actions.fix: Create CLAUDE_ONE_PASTE.md with one-liner prompt from 002-ref-quick-start-guide.md line 17

actions.issue: References non-existent CLAUDE_ONE_PASTE.md file
actions.impact: New users following README get immediate error
actions.fix: Either create CLAUDE_ONE_PASTE.md (preferred) or update README to use inline prompt

actions.issue: Duplicate 'Support & Contact' sections appear twice
actions.impact: Looks unprofessional, confuses documentation structure
actions.fix: Remove first occurrence (lines 299-304), keep only final section

actions.issue: References non-existent files: 11_roadmap.md, 13_implementation_plan.md
actions.impact: Template cross-references fail, users confused about dependencies
actions.fix: Replace with valid references: 18_release_plan.md, 05_market_research.md

actions.issue: References non-existent 001-qsg-quick-start-guide.md
actions.impact: AI assistant following CLAUDE.md instructions will fail
actions.fix: Update reference to existing 002-ref-quick-start-guide.md

actions.issue: Four competing 'Quick Start' sections create user confusion
actions.impact: Users don't know which workflow to follow, abandon setup
actions.fix: Consolidate into decision tree with 4 clearly-labeled paths (One-Paste, /new-project, Cursor, Enterprise) with time estimates

actions.issue: Template metadata lacks version, type, and time estimate
actions.impact: Users can't assess template difficulty or track template changes
actions.fix: Add: Version, Template Type, Estimated Time fields to metadata block

actions.issue: Placeholder formats inconsistent: _[text]_, [text], <text>, TBD
actions.impact: Template usability suffers, users unsure what to fill in
actions.fix: Standardize on _[PLACEHOLDER_DESCRIPTION]_ format across all 22 templates

actions.issue: No FAQ document exists despite common user questions
actions.impact: Users ask same questions repeatedly, higher support burden
actions.fix: Create comprehensive FAQ covering: installation, workflow choice, template customization, licensing

actions.issue: No troubleshooting guide for common errors
actions.impact: Users get stuck on simple errors with no recovery path
actions.fix: Create troubleshooting guide with: diagnosis steps, common errors, solutions, escalation path

actions.issue: No completed documentation examples in repository
actions.impact: Users don't know what good output looks like
actions.fix: Add 1-2 completed project examples to examples/sample-output/ directory

actions.issue: Templates lack 'When to Use This Template' guidance
actions.impact: Users unsure which templates to use for their project
actions.fix: Add 'When to Use' and 'Prerequisites' fields to template metadata

actions.issue: Inconsistent link formatting: backticks vs plain text vs markdown links
actions.impact: Reduced readability and discoverability
actions.fix: Standardize on markdown links for all document references: [Text](path)

actions.issue: No guide for maintainers on how to update templates
actions.impact: Template maintenance is ad-hoc, inconsistent updates
actions.fix: Create SOP for template updates: versioning, testing, documentation requirements

actions.issue: Documentation files lack structured metadata blocks
actions.impact: Difficult to track doc versions, updates, and status
actions.fix: Add metadata block to all 01-Docs/ files: Last Updated, Version, Status, Maintainer

actions.issue: Templates don't have individual version numbers
actions.impact: Users can't tell if templates have changed since they forked
actions.fix: Add 'Template Version' and 'Last Major Change' to metadata

actions.issue: [Unreleased] section vague, lacks specificity
actions.impact: Contributors don't know what's coming, poor release planning
actions.fix: Populate [Unreleased] with planned features from roadmap

actions.issue: No decision tree to help users choose workflow
actions.impact: Users paralyzed by choice, may choose wrong workflow
actions.fix: Create interactive decision tree: Answer 2-3 questions → get recommended workflow

actions.issue: Some templates lack concrete examples in complex sections
actions.impact: Users struggle with abstract guidance
actions.fix: Add 'Example' blocks to complex sections (OKRs, KPIs, Risk Assessment)

actions.issue: No validation steps after setup/generation
actions.impact: Users unsure if setup worked correctly
actions.fix: Add 'Validate Your Setup' section with expected outputs and verification commands

actions.issue: No beginner-friendly contribution ideas listed
actions.impact: New contributors don't know where to start
actions.fix: Create doc with: good first issues, beginner tasks, impact ratings

actions.issue: No copyright headers in template files
actions.impact: Unclear attribution requirements for modified templates
actions.fix: Add copyright header to all templates: Copyright, License reference, attribution requirements

actions.issue: No explicit 'Can I use commercially?' statement
actions.impact: Users uncertain about commercial usage despite Apache 2.0
actions.fix: Add 'Commercial Use: ✅ Allowed (Apache 2.0)' to README features section

actions.issue: Templates don't include completion time estimates
actions.impact: Users can't plan time allocation for documentation work
actions.fix: Add 'Estimated Time: XX-YY minutes' to all template metadata

actions.issue: No index or catalog of templates with descriptions
actions.impact: Users must check README or browse directory to discover templates
actions.fix: Create professional-templates/INDEX.md with: template list, descriptions, use cases, difficulty ratings

actions.issue: Templates lack tags/keywords for searchability
actions.impact: Difficult to find templates by topic (security, compliance, UX, etc.)
actions.fix: Add 'Tags:' field to metadata with relevant keywords

actions.issue: No 'What to do next' guidance after generation
actions.impact: Users unsure how to proceed after docs are generated
actions.fix: Add 'Next Steps' section: Review docs, customize [CUSTOMIZE] sections, share with team, iterate

actions.issue: No difficulty rating for templates
actions.impact: Beginners may start with complex templates and get overwhelmed
actions.fix: Add 'Difficulty: Beginner|Intermediate|Advanced' to metadata

actions.issue: No expected review timeline mentioned
actions.impact: Contributors don't know how long to wait for PR review
actions.fix: Add 'Expected Review Timeline: 2-5 business days' to review process section

actions.issue: Phrase 'no dependencies or complex setup required' could be clearer
actions.impact: Users may still expect some setup complexity
actions.fix: Rephrase to: 'Zero dependencies — no Docker, no build tools, just git clone and use'

actions.issue: No prerequisites section for templates that depend on others
actions.impact: Users create templates out of order, missing context
actions.fix: Add 'Prerequisites: Complete [list] before this template' where applicable

actions.issue: No migration guide for version upgrades
actions.impact: Fork users don't know how to sync upstream changes
actions.fix: Create migration guide: How to update forked repo, handle conflicts, preserve customizations

actions.issue: No interactive template selection tool
actions.impact: Users must manually decide which templates to use
actions.fix: Create CLI tool: Answer 3-5 questions → get recommended template set

actions.issue: No video walkthrough for visual learners
actions.impact: Visual learners underserved, higher learning curve
actions.fix: Create 3-5 minute video: Clone → generate → customize workflow

actions.issue: No formal template versioning strategy documented
actions.impact: Template evolution is ad-hoc, breaking changes unpredictable
actions.fix: Create ADR: Template versioning strategy, schema versions, deprecation policy

actions.issue: No breaking changes policy defined
actions.impact: Users surprised by incompatible updates
actions.fix: Create policy: What constitutes breaking change, deprecation timeline, migration support

actions.issue: No animated GIF showing workflow in action
actions.impact: README less engaging, harder to grasp workflow quickly
actions.fix: Create animated GIF: Quick workflow demonstration for README

actions.issue: No index by topic (security, compliance, UX, etc.)
actions.impact: Hard to find all security-related templates, for example
actions.fix: Create topic index: Security templates, Compliance templates, UX templates, etc.

actions.issue: No visual diagram of template relationships/dependencies
actions.impact: Users don't understand template workflow or order
actions.fix: Create Mermaid diagram showing template dependencies and recommended order

actions.issue: No package.json or VERSION file for semantic versioning
actions.impact: Difficult to programmatically determine version
actions.fix: Add package.json with version field, enforce semantic versioning

actions.issue: No documentation on using with other AI tools (GPT, Gemini, etc.)
actions.impact: Users don't know if templates work with their preferred AI
actions.fix: Create compatibility guide: How to use with ChatGPT, Gemini, other AI assistants

actions.issue: No guide on how to customize templates for company standards
actions.impact: Enterprise teams don't know how to adapt for their needs
actions.fix: Create guide: Fork workflow, preserve upstream sync, add company branding, customize metadata

actions.issue: Feature comparison table lacks performance metrics
actions.impact: Users can't gauge actual time/resource savings
actions.fix: Add row to comparison table: Typical generation time, resource usage

actions.issue: No examples of integrating with existing workflows (Jira, Notion, etc.)
actions.impact: Enterprise users don't see how this fits their stack
actions.fix: Create integration examples: Jira sync, Notion import, Confluence export

actions.issue: No user testimonials or success stories
actions.impact: Less social proof for new users considering adoption
actions.fix: Add success stories section: User testimonials, case studies, metrics

actions.issue: Roadmap exists in README but not as standalone doc
actions.impact: Users can't easily track planned features or suggest priorities
actions.fix: Extract roadmap to dedicated doc with: planned features, timelines, voting mechanism

actions.issue: Contributors mentioned in README but no dedicated recognition page
actions.impact: Less incentive for community contributions
actions.fix: Create contributors page: Detailed contributions, impact metrics, recognition levels
